{"id":1523495830,"question_id":3632,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1738084335,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1523495830/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Button with Longest Push Time","memory":"26.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int buttonWithLongestTime(vector<vector<int>>& events) {\n        //events[i] = [indexi, timei], The array is sorted in increasing order of time.\n        int smallestIdx = events[0][0];\n        int LongestTime = events[0][1];\n        for(int i=1; i<events.size(); i++) {\n            int indexi = events[i][0];\n            int timei = events[i][1];\n            int prevTime = events[i-1][1];\n            int pressT = timei - prevTime;\n            if(pressT > LongestTime) {\n                LongestTime = pressT;\n                smallestIdx = indexi;\n            } else if(pressT == LongestTime) {\n                smallestIdx = min(smallestIdx, indexi);\n            };\n        };\n        return smallestIdx;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"button-with-longest-push-time","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
